NG0421:1: rgyud 'di'i mtshan ni ji ltar gzung *//
NG0421:3: ston pas 'khor la bka' stsal pa /
NG0421:4: rin chen nyi zla brtsegs pa ni //
NG0421:6: nyi ma snang gsal thabs kyi rgyud //
NG0421:7: zla ba mun sel shes rab rgyud //
NG0421:8: thabs dang shes rab brtsegs pa'i rgyud //
NG0421:9: nyi mas ka dag 'ong gsal ston //
NG0421:10: zla bas gti mug ma rig sel //
NG0421:11: ka dag ma rig mun sel rgyud du zung *//
NG0421:13: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i rgyud las /
NG0421:14: mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o // //
NG0421:15: nyi zla ri rab bla ma snying sems man ngag
NG0421:16: gter du 'chang *// skal ldan dam tshig bsrung ba la dam tshig gtad /
NG0421:18: snod med dam nyams zong tshong lag tu shor ra re //
